data.actual_result: The server icon on the settings has cut-off words (which also are ignoring the circular frame)
data.expected_result: The server icon rendered at the side is like the one in the settings.
data.short_description: Default server icon with long names are cut off in Settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Server Settings on a server without an icon - Change the server name to something with more than 6 words separated by spaces - (Note: when exiting the server settings, look at the side, and see how it isn't cut-off)
